attributes.action: Stop immigrants coming into this country, taking all houses and getting more rights than UK citizens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop all immigrants coming into this country taking all the houses, having cars given to them, jobs if they want it and generally what ever they want. They also seem to have more rights than us and get more benefits!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
